graphql.query:
mutation createEnrollment($input: CreateEnrollmentInput!) { 
    createEnrollment(input: $input) {
      clientUuid
      subscriberUuid
      enrollmentTypeId
      referralDate
      referralReceivedDate
      dischargedOn
      locationUuid
      treatmentStartDate
      treatmentEndDate
      enrollmentStatusId
      firstAppointmentDate
      reasonForReferral
      referrerUuid
      organizationUuid
      caseUuid
      refNum
      pid
      cii
      createdBy
      updatedBy
      createdAt
      updatedAt

      petitioner {
        clientUuid
        relationshipToOtherClient
        clientRole
        deletedAt
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }

      respondent {
        clientUuid
        relationshipToOtherClient
        clientRole
        deletedAt
        createdAt
        updatedAt
      }
    }
  }

query listEnrollments($clientUuid: ID!, $offset: Int, $limit: Int) {
          listEnrollments(clientUuid: $clientUuid, offset: $offset, limit: $limit) {
            id 
            uuid 
            clientUuid
            subscriberUuid
            enrollmentTypeId
            referralDate
            referralReceivedDate
            dischargedOn
            locationUuid
            treatmentStartDate
            treatmentEndDate
            enrollmentStatusId
            firstAppointmentDate
            reasonForReferral
            referrerUuid
            organizationUuid
            caseUuid
            refNum
            pid
            cii
            createdBy
            updatedBy
            createdAt
            updatedAt

            enrollmentClients{
              id  
              clientUuid
              enrollmentId
              relationshipToOtherClient
              clientRole
              deletedAt
              createdAt
              updatedAt
            }

            

          }
        }

query showEnrollmentDetails($uuid: ID!) {
    showEnrollmentDetails(uuid: $uuid) {
    id
    clientUuid
    subscriberUuid
    enrollmentTypeId
    referralDate
    referralReceivedDate
    dischargedOn
    locationUuid
    treatmentStartDate
    treatmentEndDate
    enrollmentStatusId
    firstAppointmentDate
    reasonForReferral
    referrerUuid
    organizationUuid
    caseUuid
    refNum
    pid
    cii
    createdBy
    updatedBy
    createdAt
    updatedAt

    sexualVariable{
        id
        uuid
        enrollmentId
        orgasmsPerTypicalAverageWeek
        highestNoOfOrgasmsInNLastMonths
        ageAtFirstExposureToSem
        noOfTimesViewedSemOverLifetime
        createdBy
        updatedBy
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }

    criminalBackground{
        id  
        uuid
        enrollmentId
        ageAtFirstOffense
        numberOfCharges
        numberOfConvictions
        createdBy
        updatedBy
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }

    offenseHistories{
        id
        uuid
        enrollmentId
        indexOffense
        offenseDisposition
        offenseDetails
        comments
        createdBy
        updatedBy
        createdAt
        updatedAt
    }
  }
}
